verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G3101><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%>
saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%>' seat. <S%G2515><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> things therefore <S%G3767><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> they tell <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> to observe, <S%G5083><s%> observe <S%G5083><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> do, <S%G4160><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> their <S%G846><s%> works; <S%G2041><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they say, <S%G3004><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> do. <S%G4160><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> they bind <S%G1195><s%> heavy <S%G926><s%> burdens <S%G5413><s%> that are grievous to be borne, <S%G1419><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lay <S%G2007><s%> them on <S%G1909><s%> men <S%G444><s%>'s shoulders; <S%G5606><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> they themselves will <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lift <S%G2795><s%> a finger <S%G1147><s%> to <S%G1147><s%> help <S%G846><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> their <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> they do <S%G4160><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> be seen <S%G2300><s%> by men. <S%G444><s%> They make their <S%G846><s%> phylacteries <S%G5440><s%> broad, <S%G4115><s%> enlarge <S%G3170><s%> the fringes <S%G2899><s%> of <S%G2440><s%> their <S%G846><s%> garments, <S%G2440><s%>
and <S%G5037><s%> love <S%G5368><s%> the place <S%G4411><s%> of honor at <S%G1722><s%> feasts, <S%G1173><s%> the best seats <S%G4410><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the synagogues, <S%G4864><s%>
the salutations <S%G783><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the marketplaces, <S%G58><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to be called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G4461><s%> 'Rabbi, Rabbi <S%G4461><s%>' by <S%G5259><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> be <S%G2564><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G4461><s%> 'Rabbi,' for <S%G1063><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> teacher, <S%G2519><s%> the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of you <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> brothers. <S%G80><s%>

Call <S%G2564><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> man on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> father, <S%G3962><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> he who is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
Neither <S%G3366><s%> be called <S%G2564><s%> masters, <S%G2519><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> master, <S%G2519><s%> the Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> he who is greatest <S%G3187><s%> among you <S%G5216><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> servant. <S%G1249><s%>

Whoever <S%G3748><s%> exalts <S%G5312><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> will be humbled, <S%G5013><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> whoever <S%G3748><s%> humbles <S%G5013><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> will be exalted. <S%G5312><s%>

"But woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> you shut up <S%G2808><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of Heaven <S%G3772><s%> against <S%G1715><s%> men; <S%G444><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> enter in <S%G1525><s%> yourselves, <S%G3761><s%> neither do you <S%G863><s%> allow those who are entering <S%G1525><s%> in to enter. <S%G1525><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> you devour <S%G2719><s%> widows <S%G5503><s%>' houses, <S%G3614><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> as a pretense <S%G4392><s%> you make <S%G4336><s%> long <S%G3117><s%> prayers. <S%G1223><s%> Therefore <S%G5124><s%> you will receive <S%G2983><s%> greater <S%G4053><s%> condemnation. <S%G2917><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> you travel around <S%G4013><s%> by sea <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> land <S%G3584><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> proselyte; <S%G4339><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he becomes <S%G1096><s%> one, <S%G4160><s%> you make him <S%G846><s%> twice as much <S%G1362><s%> of a son <S%G5207><s%> of Gehenna <S%G1067><s%> as yourselves. <S%G5216><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> you blind <S%G5185><s%> guides, <S%G3595><s%> who say, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3739><s%> 'Whoever swears <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the temple, <S%G3485><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> nothing; <S%G3762><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> whoever <S%G3739><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the gold <S%G5557><s%> of the temple, <S%G3485><s%> he is obligated. <S%G3784><s%>'

You blind <S%G5185><s%> fools! <S%G3474><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> greater, <S%G3187><s%> the gold, <S%G5557><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> that sanctifies <S%G37><s%> the gold? <S%G5557><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> 'Whoever swears <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the altar, <S%G2379><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> nothing; <S%G3762><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> whoever <S%G302><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the gift <S%G1435><s%> that is on <S%G1883><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> he is obligated? <S%G3784><s%>'

You blind <S%G5185><s%> fools! <S%G3474><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> is greater, <S%G3173><s%> the gift, <S%G1435><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%> that sanctifies <S%G37><s%> the gift? <S%G1435><s%>

He <S%G3660><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> who swears <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the altar, <S%G2379><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> on it. <S%G846><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> who swears <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the temple, <S%G3485><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> him who was living <S%G2730><s%> in it. <S%G2730><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> who swears <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> him who sits <S%G2521><s%> on it. <S%G846><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> you tithe <S%G586><s%> mint, <S%G2238><s%> dill, <S%G432><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cumin, <S%G2951><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have left undone <S%G863><s%> the weightier <S%G926><s%> matters of the law: <S%G3551><s%> justice, <S%G2532><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faith. <S%G4102><s%> But you <S%G1163><s%> ought to have done <S%G4160><s%> these, <S%G5023><s%> and <S%G2548><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to have left <S%G863><s%> the other <S%G2548><s%> undone. <S%G863><s%>
You blind <S%G5185><s%> guides, <S%G3595><s%> who strain out <S%G1368><s%> a gnat, <S%G2971><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> swallow <S%G2666><s%> a camel! <S%G2574><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> you clean <S%G2511><s%> the outside <S%G1855><s%> of the cup <S%G4221><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the platter, <S%G3953><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> within <S%G2081><s%> they are full <S%G1073><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> extortion <S%G724><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unrighteousness. <S%G192><s%>

You blind <S%G5185><s%> Pharisee, <S%G5330><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> clean <S%G2511><s%> the inside <S%G1787><s%> of the cup <S%G4221><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the platter, <S%G3953><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> its <S%G846><s%> outside <S%G1622><s%> may become <S%G1096><s%> clean <S%G2513><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> you are like whitened <S%G2867><s%> tombs, <S%G5028><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> outwardly <S%G1855><s%> appear <S%G5316><s%> beautiful, <S%G5611><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> inwardly <S%G2081><s%> are <S%G1073><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of <S%G3747><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> men <S%G3747><s%>'s bones, and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G3747><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> uncleanness. <S%G167><s%>

Even so <S%G3779><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> outwardly <S%G1855><s%> appear <S%G5316><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> to men, <S%G444><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> inwardly <S%G2081><s%> you are <S%G2075><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of hypocrisy <S%G5272><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> iniquity. <S%G458><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> you build <S%G3618><s%> the tombs <S%G5028><s%> of the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> decorate <S%G2885><s%> the tombs <S%G3419><s%> of the righteous, <S%G1342><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G1487><s%> 'If we had lived <S%G1510><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of <S%G3962><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fathers, <S%G3962><s%> we <S%G302><s%> wouldn't <S%G3756><s%> have been <S%G1510><s%> partakers <S%G2844><s%> with them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>'

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> you testify <S%G3140><s%> to yourselves <S%G1438><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you are <S%G2075><s%> children <S%G5207><s%> of those who killed <S%G5407><s%> the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
Fill <S%G4137><s%> up, <S%G4137><s%> then, <S%G2532><s%> the measure <S%G3358><s%> of <S%G3962><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> fathers. <S%G3962><s%>
You serpents, <S%G3789><s%> you offspring <S%G1081><s%> of vipers, <S%G2191><s%> how will <S%G4459><s%> you escape <S%G5343><s%> the <S%G575><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> of Gehenna? <S%G1067><s%>

Therefore, <S%G5124><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> send <S%G649><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> prophets, <S%G4396><s%> wise men, <S%G4680><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes. <S%G1122><s%> Some of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> you will kill <S%G615><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> crucify; <S%G4717><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> some of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> you will scourge <S%G3146><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> persecute <S%G1377><s%> from <S%G575><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> city; <S%G4172><s%>

that <S%G3704><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> may come <S%G2064><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> shed <S%G1632><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of righteous <S%G1342><s%> Abel <S%G6><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of Zachariah <S%G2197><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> of Barachiah, <S%G914><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you killed <S%G5407><s%> between <S%G3342><s%> the sanctuary <S%G3485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the altar. <S%G2379><s%>

Most certainly <S%G281><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> will come <S%G2240><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>

"Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> who kills <S%G615><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stones <S%G3036><s%> those who are sent <S%G649><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> her! <S%G846><s%> How often <S%G4212><s%> I would have <S%G2309><s%> gathered <S%G1996><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> together, <S%G1996><s%> even <S%G3739><s%> as <S%G5158><s%> a hen <S%G3733><s%> gathers <S%G1996><s%> her <S%G1438><s%> chicks <S%G3556><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> her wings, <S%G4420><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you would <S%G2309><s%> not! <S%G3756><s%>
Behold, <S%G2400><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> is left <S%G863><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> desolate. <S%G2048><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> you will <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> from now <S%G737><s%> on, <S%G2193><s%> until you <S%G302><s%> say, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G2127><s%> 'Blessed is he who comes <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord! <S%G2962><s%>'"
